thread.title: SLAUGHTER OF WILD CHICKENS OF SIN MIN WAS UNNECESSARY
thread.title_full: SLAUGHTER OF WILD CHICKENS OF SIN MIN WAS UNNECESSARY

author: farhan
title: SLAUGHTER OF WILD CHICKENS OF SIN MIN WAS UNNECESSARY
text:
SLAUGHTER OF WILD CHICKENS OF SIN MIN WAS UNNECESSARY Submitted by farhan on Advertisement 
<Facebook post by Ong Seh Hong> 
These were the same flocks of wild chicken in Sin Min estate that were slaughtered recently. My family and neighbours never found them a nuisance. Instead we enjoy the sights of them roaming in the estate. We were never disturbed by their morning calls. 
very upset and saddened by the unnecessary culling. why can't we human beings learn to live in harmony with other creatures? Source:
